Release Description

Create the ultimate machine and get the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again! Can you create the ulti
mate flying/driving/crawling machine and steer them safely to
their destination? With your help and lots of creativity, a few
basic pieces can turn into the most amazing transportation!

Bad Piggies has more than 90 levels, plus free updates, so there s
no end to the crashing, driving, and flying fun! Use 33 different
objects to explore the world with the most fantastic machines you
can imagine!

CPU: 1.0 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
Hard Drive: 60 MB
Graphics: Any OpenGL 1.3 compatible device
Internet connection required for activation and updates

Piracy Policy

Reverse engineering is our religion and our .nfo is our digital

ince time is money, we are actually losing money doing this - have

We cannot be held responsible for any possible leak, only the per

any case piracy the way it looks nowadays has to be hunted down

tise in shifting attention to what is really not the deal is im
pressive, as usual

You might be watching us, but we are also watching you

ErES - Group Information

It's been over four years since ErES was established, and now, as
